author: fmenge:ez.no
msg: - Removed isPrimitive() from TypeMapper and added isScalarType() and
isSpecialType(), which behave in accordance to the PHP Manual
- Changed TypeFactory to use isScalarType() and isSpecialType()
- Added support for ReflectionClass instances to TypeFactory and ObjectType
to allow forwarding of injected reflection sources to the ObjectType
- Instances of ezcReflectionClassType are now solely created through the
TypeFactory, which makes the type system completely exchangeable

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Fixed wrong links in release announcement.

author: fmenge:ez.no
msg: - Renamed ClassType into ObjectType and changed it to extend PrimitiveType
- Changed Class, Object, Property, Method, Parameter, Extension, and
ReflectionApi to return ezcReflectionClass instead of
ezcReflectionClassType and adapted test cases accordingly

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Update release and documentation build instructions.
